summary: A mountainside lodge with awesome views built around a waterfall northeast of Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/521/sentinell.jpg/][IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/8915/sentinell.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

A picturesque fully equipped player home by a mountain waterfall northeast of Ivarstead. Interior has a cellar, dungeon, secret doors and trapdoors, kitchen, a natural rock cave spa and stacks more! I\'ve put a lot of blood, sweat and bourbon into making this home and I\'ve been using it for 2 full playthroughs now so it\'s pretty well play tested! Recently updated to version 1.5... Enjoy!

Features:
- working mannequins
- working weapon racks and plaques
- blacksmithing, enchanting, alchemy and cooking areas
- safe usable storage chests
- npc merchant with lots of gold
- npc fence with 1000 gold
- secret dungeon area with all 9 blessing altars
- mad waterfall and views!


--------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

1.5
- added smelter
- added watchtower and lookout
- added trapdoor to dungeon in guest bedroom
- lots of small aesthetic fixes

1.4
- added bathing pool and guest bedroom
- fixed navmesh on entrance bridge so follower won\'t get stuck
- added some extra bits n pieces

1.3
- fixed disappearing house bug (f**k yeah :-p )
- bed now gives well rested bonus
- changed dining seats so npcs can sit easier
- fixed dungeon navmesh around altar
- added gate and other stuff to entrance area
- other small visual improvements


Let me know if you find any bugs and i\'ll try to fix em in an update ( please do a clean save with mods disabled to double check before reporting any issues, thx)

CREDITS:
-Bethesda
-www.di.fm drum n bass
-Jack Daniels

Also would like to give thanks to Eldiabs for the \'Modders Resource-Weapon Racks-Bookshelves-Plaques-Mannequins\' mod, which saved me a lot of time! Here\'s a link if you are interested, but it\'s NOT necessary to download for my mod to work.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11618
author: Bludgeon
